title: Mount Elizabeth Medical Centre Crawler
description: ⚠️ ALL FIELDS ARE REQUIRED - Crawls specialist information from Mount Elizabeth Medical Centre website. Please fill out all required fields below.

siteName.title: ✅ Site Name (REQUIRED)
siteName.description: Name of the medical center - This field is required

baseUrl.title: ✅ Base URL (REQUIRED)
baseUrl.description: Base URL of the website - This field is required

startUrl.title: ✅ Start URL (REQUIRED)
startUrl.description: URL to start crawling from - This field is required

allowedUrlPatterns.title: ✅ Allowed URL Patterns (REQUIRED)
allowedUrlPatterns.description: URL patterns that are allowed to be crawled - Must contain at least one pattern

excludedUrlPatterns.title: Excluded URL Patterns (Optional)
excludedUrlPatterns.description: URL patterns to exclude from crawling - Optional field

paginationType.title: ✅ Pagination Type (REQUIRED)
paginationType.description: Type of pagination used on the website - This field is required

queryPattern.title: Query Pattern (Required for Query Pagination)
queryPattern.description: Pattern for query-based pagination (use {page} as placeholder) - Required when Pagination Type is 'query'

pathPattern.title: Path Pattern (Required for Path Pagination)
pathPattern.description: Pattern for path-based pagination (use {page} as placeholder) - Required when Pagination Type is 'path'

paginationBaseUrl.title: Pagination Base URL (Optional)
paginationBaseUrl.description: Base URL for pagination (leave empty to use startUrl) - Optional field

startPage.title: Start Page Number (Optional)
startPage.description: Page number to start pagination from - Optional, defaults to 1

specialistLinksSelector.title: ✅ Specialist Links Selector (REQUIRED)
specialistLinksSelector.description: CSS selector for specialist profile links - This field is required

nextButtonSelector.title: ✅ Next Button Selector (REQUIRED)
nextButtonSelector.description: CSS selector for the next page button - This field is required

nextButtonContainerSelector.title: ✅ Next Button Container Selector (REQUIRED)
nextButtonContainerSelector.description: CSS selector for the next button container - This field is required

doctorNameSelector.title: ✅ Doctor Name Selector (REQUIRED)
doctorNameSelector.description: CSS selector for doctor name on detail pages - This field is required

contactLinksSelector.title: ✅ Contact Links Selector (REQUIRED)
contactLinksSelector.description: CSS selector for contact links on detail pages - This field is required

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: ✅ Max Requests Per Crawl (REQUIRED)
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests to process - This field is required

headless.title: ✅ Headless Mode (REQUIRED)
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode - This field is required

timeout.title: ✅ Timeout (ms) (REQUIRED)
timeout.description: Timeout for page operations in milliseconds - This field is required

outputFilename.title: Output Filename (Optional)
outputFilename.description: Custom filename for the output (leave empty for auto-generated) - Optional field

cloudflareBypass.title: Enable Cloudflare Bypass (Optional)
cloudflareBypass.description: Enable Cloudflare challenge bypass using stealth techniques - Optional field

cloudflareBypassMethod.title: Cloudflare Bypass Method (Optional)
cloudflareBypassMethod.description: Method to use for Cloudflare bypass - Optional field

cloudflareWaitTime.title: Cloudflare Wait Time (ms) (Optional)
cloudflareWaitTime.description: Time to wait for Cloudflare challenge to complete in milliseconds - Optional field

cloudflareRetries.title: Cloudflare Retry Attempts (Optional)
cloudflareRetries.description: Number of retry attempts if Cloudflare challenge fails - Optional field

userAgent.title: Custom User Agent (Optional)
userAgent.description: Custom user agent string to use for requests - Optional field
userAgent.prefill: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
